name: POLYEROTICON - erotopolygonal act Nr. 9
description: Man is a being of the limit, he creates the world of work, reason and knowledge (the world of servant consciousness), but carries the consciousness of death within himself; whose presence he has taboos and prohibitions, but whose signature is inscribed on the basis of his consciousness and whose violence he cannot escape, since it is the cipher of his own desire" (George Bataille - from "Tears of Eros") JPEG 5000 x 3386, 200 DPI
